Higher is
a license to innovate.
a hackable manifesto.
an experiment in action.
an excuse to get started.
a question, not an answer.
a collection of possibilities.
a bet on your own potential.
a crash course in self belief.
a prompt for your next move.
a set of tools, not instructions.
a glimpse into something bigger.
a challenge to your comfort zone.
an antidote to 'someday' thinking.
an invitation to go higher, together.
